english.segment2: Merciful God. We confess that we have sinned against You. Merciful God. We confess that we have not loved You with our whole heart
english.segment3: In what we have done and left undone. In what we have done and left undone
english.segment4: We will lay down. We humbly repent. And we cry out for you God. Have mercy on us
english.segment5: Merciful God. Forgive us now. That we may delight in Your will. And walk in Your ways. And lift high Your name. And walk in Your ways. And lift high Your name.
